Markup: Title with Markdown

by Positively Deadly Podcast
January 5, 2013

Categories

  • Markdown

Tags

  • css
  • html
  • title

Using Markdown in the title should have no adverse effect on the layout or functionality.

page.title example:

title: "Markup: Title *with* **Markdown**""
